definition: An arrangement to meet someone at a particular time and place.
example: I have a doctor's appointment at 10 a.m. tomorrow.

definition: To take and use something belonging to someone else with the intention of returning it.
example: Can I borrow your pen for a moment?

definition: A plan of activities or events and when they will happen.
example: I have a busy schedule this week with meetings and deadlines.

definition: The movement of vehicles along roads.
example: I was late because of heavy traffic on the highway.

definition: A serious, unexpected, and often dangerous situation requiring immediate action.
example: Call this number in case of an emergency.

definition: An arrangement by which a company provides compensation for loss, damage, illness, or death.
example: You need health insurance when living in the U.S.

definition: A time or date by which something must be done.
example: We are working hard to meet the project deadline.

definition: To travel regularly between home and work or school.
example: I commute to the city every day by train.

definition: An infectious disease like a very bad cold.
example: He missed work last week because he had the flu.

definition: An arrangement made with a bank to keep your money there and to allow you to take it out when needed.
example: I opened a new bank account after moving to the U.S.

definition: A talk giving information about something.
example: I gave a presentation about our new product to the team.

definition: An arrangement in which a group of people travel together in one car and share the cost.
example: We carpool to work to save money on gas.

definition: A medical examination to test your general state of health.
example: She goes for a checkup every six months.

definition: A small plastic card that you use to buy things now and pay for them later.
example: I prefer using a credit card for online purchases.

definition: A move to a more important job or position in a company or organization.
example: He got a promotion and is now the regional manager.

definition: A written statement of money owed for goods or services.
example: Can we get the bill, please?

definition: A person you work with in a profession or business.
example: I had lunch with a colleague from marketing.

definition: A journey through air, especially in an airplane.
example: Our flight to New York was delayed.

definition: A piece of paper on which a doctor writes the medicine you need.
example: The doctor gave me a prescription for antibiotics.

definition: Money paid regularly by an employer to an employee.
example: She receives her salary at the end of each month.
